identifier: In the automative production, parts are manufactured and assembled into vehicle components and ultimately vehicles.

definition_en: A part in the automotive context is a component of a vehicle, such as the engine, brakes, or transmission.
A part that has a part number.
A part that has a unique batch number.
A part that has a unique serial number.
synonyms_en: part as built, part as produced

definition_en: A part that has electronics components.
A part that is replaced in a vehicle.
Two parts that can be used interchangeably.
A part that is composed of other parts.
A sub assembly is a subset of the components that make up a larger assembly.
A part that is composed of other parts.
A part that is unfinished component.
A part that is composed of other parts.
